fields.label: Tick items you are submitting
fields.summary: Use the checklist on the form. Tick all required attachments for your claim type (e.g., completed claim form, IDs, police/incident report, photos, OR/CR, driver’s license, repair estimate, etc.). Attach copies as instructed.

fields.label: Policy Number
fields.summary: Write the policy number shown on your policy schedule.

fields.label: Claim Reference Number
fields.summary: For office use; leave blank unless provided by AXA.

fields.label: Full Name of Assured
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle.

fields.label: Date of Birth
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Place of Birth
fields.summary: Write city/municipality and province/country.

fields.label: Mobile No.
fields.summary: Write active mobile number.

fields.label: Home Phone No. (Optional)
fields.summary: Write landline with area code, or leave blank.

fields.label: TIN/SSS/GSIS No.
fields.summary: Write the number of the Assured or Authorized Representative.

fields.label: Nationality
fields.summary: Write nationality/citizenship.

fields.label: Sex
fields.summary: Tick: Male or Female.

fields.label: Type of Valid ID
fields.summary: Write ID type presented (e.g., Driver’s License, Passport).

fields.label: Valid ID No.
fields.summary: Write the ID number.

fields.label: Residence/Present Address
fields.summary: Unit/Floor, Bldg, Street, Barangay, City, Province.

fields.label: Email Address
fields.summary: Write active email (updates sent here).

fields.label: Source of Fund
fields.summary: Tick: Employment Income • Business Income • Others (specify).

fields.label: Politically Exposed Person (PEP)?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, state nature of relation/position.

fields.label: Year
fields.summary: Write vehicle year model.

fields.label: Model
fields.summary: Write specific model/variant.

fields.label: Type
fields.summary: Write vehicle type (e.g., Sedan, SUV, MC).

fields.label: Make
fields.summary: Write manufacturer/brand.

fields.label: Registered Owner
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle.

fields.label: Engine No.
fields.summary: Write engine number.

fields.label: Serial/Chassis No.
fields.summary: Write chassis/VIN.

fields.label: Plate No.
fields.summary: Write plate number (or conduction no.).

sections.title: Driver’s Information (fill only if driver ≠ Assured)

fields.label: Full Name of Driver
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle.

fields.label: Age
fields.summary: Write driver’s age.

fields.label: License Type
fields.summary: Write license type (e.g., Prof/Non-Prof; restriction codes if any).

fields.label: License No.
fields.summary: Write driver’s license number.

fields.label: License Expiry Date
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Relationship to Assured
fields.summary: If applicable, state relationship (e.g., employee, relative).

fields.label: Residence/Present Address
fields.summary: Unit/Floor, Bldg, Street, Barangay, City, Province.

fields.label: Is the driver an employee of the Assured?
fields.summary: Tick Yes or No.

fields.label: Who authorized the driver to use the vehicle?
fields.summary: Write name/designation of authorizing person.

sections.title: Details of the Accident or Loss

fields.label: Date of Accident or Loss
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Time of Accident or Loss
fields.summary: Write HH:MM (24-hr or AM/PM).

fields.label: Weather during the Accident/Loss
fields.summary: Tick: Clear • Raining • Poor Visibility • Others (specify).

fields.label: Place of Accident or Loss
fields.summary: Write exact location (street, city, province).

fields.label: Full Name of Police Authority
fields.summary: If reported, write officer’s Last, First, Middle.

fields.label: Nature of Business
fields.summary: Write Assured’s business/industry.

fields.label: Purpose of Use of the Vehicle
fields.summary: Write purpose at the time (e.g., personal, business errand).

fields.label: Used for hire or rent?
fields.summary: Tick one: Hire • Rent • Others (specify).

fields.label: Registered as PAMI/TNVS?
fields.summary: Tick: PAMI • TNVS • Others (specify).

fields.label: Direction of the vehicle during the accident
fields.summary: Write direction (e.g., Northbound, turning left).

fields.label: Speed of the vehicle during the accident
fields.summary: Write approximate speed.

fields.label: Direction of other party’s vehicle
fields.summary: Write direction of other vehicle.

fields.label: Speed of other party’s vehicle
fields.summary: Write approximate speed of other vehicle.

fields.label: Cause of Collision
fields.summary: Briefly explain proximate cause (e.g., rear-ended while stopping).

fields.label: Party at fault (if any)
fields.summary: Write perceived at-fault party (e.g., other driver/Assured/unknown).

fields.label: Settlements made with other party’s vehicle
fields.summary: Write any on-site settlement/agreements.

fields.label: Explain delay
fields.summary: If notice filed beyond 6 months from accident/loss, state reasons.

sections.title: List of Affected Persons (other than the Driver)

fields.label: Affected Person 1
fields.summary: Write Name, Age, Address; tick if injured; tick one: Passenger of Insured Car • Passenger of Other Car • Pedestrian.

fields.label: Affected Persons 2–N
fields.summary: Repeat details for each person affected.

fields.label: Where was the injured person/s taken?
fields.summary: Write destination (hospital/clinic) if any.

fields.label: Who took care of the injured person/s?
fields.summary: Write person/agency who assisted.

sections.title: Description of Damage/s to Vehicle of Assured

fields.label: Parts Damaged & Description
fields.summary: List each part and describe damage; note extent.

fields.label: Current Location of Vehicle
fields.summary: Write current location (home, shop, yard, address).

fields.label: Owner’s Full Name
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle of third-party owner.

fields.label: Owner’s Address
fields.summary: Write full address.

fields.label: Contact Details (Owner)
fields.summary: Write mobile/landline.

fields.label: Type of Vehicle
fields.summary: Write vehicle type; if motor car, include Year Model, Make, Plate No.

fields.label: Nature and Extent of Damage
fields.summary: Describe observed damage.

fields.label: Is the Other Party insured?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, write name of insurer.

fields.label: Third Party Insurer’s Contact Person
fields.summary: Write contact person’s full name and contact details.

fields.label: Witness 1
fields.summary: Write Name, Address, Contact Details.

fields.label: Witnesses 2–N
fields.summary: Repeat for each witness.

fields.label: Sketch of Accident
fields.summary: Draw vehicles (mark yours as “A”, other as “B”), street names, directions, positions, and objects.

fields.label: Brief Description of Accident/Loss
fields.summary: Narrate what happened; refer to vehicles as “A” and “B” where applicable.

fields.label: Payout Method
fields.summary: Choose one: FUND TRANSFER (PHP/USD) • GCASH TRANSFER (PHP only, ≤ ₱10,000).

fields.label: Proof of Account
fields.summary: Attach proof matching policy currency (passbook/bank cert/SOA or verified GCash profile screenshot).

fields.label: Bank Account – Request for Direct Credit
fields.summary: Write Bank Name, Branch Name/Code, Branch Address, Account Name of Payee, Account Number, Account Type, Currency (Peso/Dollar), Metrobank or Others, SWIFT (if non-Metrobank).

fields.label: International Wire (if applicable)
fields.summary: Write Routing/IBAN (if any) and Policy Owner’s complete address abroad.

fields.label: GCash Details
fields.summary: Write Account Name and 11-digit Mobile No. (e.g., 091XXXXXXXX). Note transfer limit and possible bank charges.

fields.label: Release/Obtain Information Authorization
fields.summary: Sign to authorize AXA/representatives to request and receive information (e.g., LTO, PNP, LTFRB, hospitals/physicians).

fields.label: Declarations
fields.summary: Read all statements (accuracy, data use/rights, payment release, fees, liability). Tick/acknowledge as required.

fields.label: Signature over Printed Name of Assured
fields.summary: Sign (do not sign a blank form).

fields.label: Signed at / Date
fields.summary: Write place signed and date (e.g., City, MM/DD/YYYY).

fields.label: Marketing Consent (Optional)
fields.summary: Tick if you consent to receive notices/announcements for marketing/cross-selling by SMS/email/call.
